name: vscode-image-gallery
description: Improve image browsing experience, especially for remote development.

sorting.byPathOptions.localeMatcher.markdownDescription: The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "`lookup`" and "`best fit`".

sorting.byPathOptions.sensitivity.markdownDescription:
Which differences in the strings should be taken into account. Possible values are:
- "`base`": Only strings that differ in base letters compare as unequal. Examples: a ‚â† b, a = √°, a = A.
- "`accent`": Only strings that differ in base letters or accents compare as unequal. Examples: a ‚â† b, a ‚â† √°, a = A.
- "`case`": Only strings that differ in base letters or case compare as unequal. Examples: a ‚â† b, a = √°, a ‚â† A.
- "`variant`": All strings compare as unequal.

sorting.byPathOptions.numeric.markdownDescription: Whether numeric collation should be used, such that "`img1.jpg`" > "`img2.jpg`" > "`img10.jpg`", instead of "`img1.jpg`" > "`img10.jpg`" > "`img2.jpg`".

sorting.byPathOptions.caseFirst.markdownDescription: Whether upper case or lower case should sort first. Possible values are "`upper`", "`lower`" or "`false`" (use the locale's default).

sorting.byPathOptions.collation.markdownDescription:
Variant collations for certain locales. Possible values include:
- "`compat`" - Arabic
- "`dict`" - Sinhala
- "`emoji`" - root
- "`eor`" - root
- "`phonebk`" - German
- "`phonetic`" - Lingala
- "`pinyin`" - Chinese
- "`reformed`" - Swedish
- "`stroke`" - Chinese
- "`trad`"
- "`zhuyin`" - Chinese

telemetry.geriyocoImageGallery.isTelemet.markdownDescription: Enable / disable telemetry of this extension. If any of the global telemetry settings, including `telemetryLevel`, `isTelemetryEnabled`, `onDidChangeTelemetryEnabled`, rejects telemetry, this setting will be treated as `false`, i.e. this extension will not send any telemetry.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
